boons.name: Curse of Agony
boons.description: Your Attack inflicts Doom.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Curse of Pain
boons.description: Your Special inflicts Doom.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Slicing Shot
boons.description: Your Cast sends a Blade Rift hurling ahead.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Duration: 4 Sec.
  • Damage Interval: 0.1 Sec.
  • Damage Radius: 150
  • Speed: 250
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Slicing Flare
boons.description: Your Cast sends a large Blade Rift hurling ahead for a brief time.
boons.prerequisites: Unique to Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Blade Dash
boons.description: Your Dash creates a Blade Rift where you started.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Ares' Aid
boons.description: Your Call turns you into an Impervious Blade Rift for 1.2 Sec.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Curse of Vengeance
boons.description: After you take damage, inflict Doom on surrounding foes.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Urge to Kill
boons.description: Your Attack and Cast deal more damage.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Battle Rage
boons.description: After slaying a foe, your next Attack or Special deals more damage.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Blood Frenzy
boons.description: After using Death Defiance, deal more damage that encounter.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: None

boons.name: Black Metal
boons.description: Your Blade Rift powers deal damage in a wider area.
boons.prerequisites: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Slicing Flare, or Slicing Shot

boons.name: Engulfing Vortex
boons.description: Your Blade Rift effects last longer and pull foes in.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Slicing Flare, or Slicing Shot

boons.name: Dire Misfortune
boons.description: Your Doom effects deal more damage when applied multiple times.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: Curse of Agony or Curse of Pain

boons.name: Impending Doom
boons.description: Your Doom effects deal more damage, after +0.5 Sec.
boons.prerequisites: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, or Curse of Vengeance

boons.name: Vicious Cycle
boons.description:
Your Blade Rift effects deal more damage for each consecutive hit.
  • Damage Increase per Hit: 2
boons.prerequisites: Black Metal or Engulfing Vortex

boons.name: Curse of Longing
boons.description:
Your Doom effects continuously strike Weak foes.
  • Successive Hit Damage: 50%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Curse of Agony or Curse of Pain
  • Aphrodite: Crush Shot, Heartbreak Flourish, Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, or Passion Flare

boons.name: Hunting Blades
boons.description:
Your Cast creates a faster Blade Rift that seeks the nearest foe.
  • Seek Duration: 3.3 Sec.
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf.
  • Cannot be combined with Freezing Vortex.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Slicing Flare or Slicing Shot
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or Hunter Dash

boons.name: Merciful End
boons.description:
Your attacks that can Deflect immediately activate Doom effects.
  • Doom Combo Damage: 40
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Curse of Agony or Curse of Pain
  • Athena: Divine Flourish or Divine Strike

boons.name: Freezing Vortex
boons.description:
Your Cast inflicts Chill, but is smaller and moves slower.
  • Blade Rift size -15%
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Slicing Flare or Slicing Shot
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash

boons.name: Curse of Nausea
boons.description:
Your Hangover effects deal damage faster.
  • Damage Rate: .5 sec -> .35 sec
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, or Curse of Vengeance
  • Dionysus: Dionysus' Aid, Drunken Dash, Drunken Flourish, or Drunken Strike

boons.name: Curse of Drowning
boons.description:
Your Cast is a pulse that deals damage to foes around you.
  • Pulses per Cast: 3
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Mirage Shot or Blizzard Shot
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Hera
boons.prerequisites:
One of each
  • Ares: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot

boons.name: Vengeful Mood
boons.description:
Your Revenge attacks sometimes occur without taking damage.
  • Auto-Revenge Rate: 3 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Ares: Ares' Aid, Blade Dash, Curse of Agony, Curse of Pain, Slicing Flare, or Slicing Shot
  • Zeus: Electric Flare, Electric Shot, Lightning Strike, Thunder Dash, Thunder Flourish, or Zeus' Aid
  • Revenge boon: Curse of Vengeance, Frozen Touch, Heaven's Vengeance, Holy Shield, or Wave of Despair

curse.name: doom
curse.description: After at least 1 Second, victim takes a burst of damage.
